place.name: WOLVERTON
place.gazetteerText: WOLVERTON, or Welverdington, a parish in Stratford-on-Avon district, Warwick; 1½ mile S of Claverdon r. station, and 5 N of Stratford. Post town, Stratford-on-Avon. Acres, 1,320. Real property, £1,809. Pop., 159. Houses, 35. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Worcester. Value, £380.* Patron, the Rev. B. Winthrop. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
